title: Hi
body: Hi! I got a problem i had and account back in a day. Lvl 30 with many champions and skins but i barrowed it to my 2 best friends back in a day when i played less. And few months after the pw was changed and they stopped logging into it too. So i would like to get riots email to contact them and find out what email i used in that acc since i forgot what email i used in it.

replies.body:
First off, I need to mention that account sharing of any kind is not good and is *against the Terms of Use*. As for recovering your account, go ahead and submit a ticket using [this form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide as much detail about your account that you can recall.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Go to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new and choose "I need help recovering my account". Give as many details as possible.
